PORTHOLE ROLLS.Description: Pull-apart soft yeast rolls baked with an herbed parmesan crust

JALAPEÑO-CHEDDAR HUSHPUPPIES.Description: half dozen organic cornmeal hushpuppies blended with minced jalapeño, cheddar cheese & local buttermilk served with white cocktail sauce for dipping (vegetarian)

LIZARD CHIPS.Description: sliced dill pickle & jalapeño chips crispy-fried in TOPO beer batter, served with chipotle ranch dipping sauce (vegetarian)

THUMBS & TOES.Description: half-pound of juicy fried chicken tenders tossed in your choice of buffalo, BBQ, Thai chili or garlic Sriracha sauce

BAVARIAN PRETZELS.Description: served with TOPO beer cheese sauce (vegetarian)

FRANKLIN STREET NACHOS.Description: crisp tortilla chips topped with cheddar cheese, black beans, pico de gallo & sour cream (vegetarian)

SWEET POTATOES & PEPPADEW PEPPER JELLY.Description: waffle-cut sweet potato fries with cream cheese & house-made pepper jelly dip (vegetarian) (gluten free)

MEDITERRANEAN HUMMUS DIP.Description: creamy house-made hummus filled with artichoke, sun dried tomatoes, Kalamata Olives, scallions & pita chips for dipping

HOUSE SALAD.Description: fresh greens, gorgonzola cheese, tomatoes, cucumbers & your choice of dressing: Old Well White vinaigrette, raspberry vinaigrette, honey dijon, blue cheese, ranch, baja or oil & vinegar (vegetarian)

GOAT CHEESE SALAD.Description: fresh greens tossed in house-made raspberry vinaigrette, garnished with pecans, golden raisins & local goat cheese (vegetarian)

BAJA CHICKEN SALAD.Description: fresh greens tossed in a house-made creamy Baja dressing, tomatoes, cucumbers, hard boiled eggs, gorgonzola, white & yellow cheddar cheese topped with cornmeal encrusted chicken skewers & Baja tortilla crisps

THAI SEARED TUNA* SALAD.Description: sliced sushi grade tuna*, seared rare with Thai chili sauce, wasabi cream, frizzled onions, honey roasted nuts & sesame seeds, atop a bed of fresh greens

SALMON SALAD.Description: grilled 8 oz. salmon on your choice of salad: house, goat cheese, Baja or Thai

TUSCAN DELI CLUB.Description: ham, turkey & smoked provolone on rustic Italian bread with shredded lettuce, tomato, red onions, banana peppers, red wine vinaigrette, chipotle aioli, served with Old Bay kettle chips

SOUTHERN FRIED CHICKEN SANDWICH.Description: local Chatham County Farms fried chicken breast with dill pickles & aioli on a house-made brioche bun, served with beer battered fries

TOP BURGER*.Description: grilled 8 oz. beef burger* with lettuce, tomato, red onion, aioli & your choice of American cheese, pepper jack, cheddar, Swiss or gorgonzola on a house-made brioche bun, served with beer-battered fries

EDAMAME BURGER.Description: house-made edamame patty with tzatziki, lettuce, tomato, & red onion on a house-made brioche bun with sweet potato waffle fries (vegetarian)

WILD MUSHROOM GRIT CAKES.Description: crisp local & organic grit cakes with sautéed portobello, shiitake & oyster mushrooms in a rosemary-cashew cream sauce (vegetarian)

LOW COUNTRY PORK CHOP.Description: grilled 12 oz. bone in pork chop with creole dijon cream sauce, herb roasted potatoes, southern cabbage and kale

BUTTERMILK FRIED CHICKEN.Description: locally sourced chicken breast, crispy fried with mushroom cream gravy topped with diced tomatoes & scallions, mashed potatoes, seasonal vegetables & a buttermilk biscuit

SOUTHWEST CHICKEN PASTA.Description: gemelli pasta tossed with grilled chicken, black beans, shoe-peg corn and chipotle cream sauce, topped with scallions, tomatoes & white cheddar cheese and crisp tortilla strips

FRENCH QUARTER JAMBALAYA.Description: shrimp, grilled chicken & Andouille sausage sautéed with arborio rice, onions, tomatoes & roasted okra in a rich Cajun broth

JAMAICAN JERK SALMON.Description: pan seared 8oz salmon with mango pico de gallo, tequila-lime butter sauce, spinach & tomato brown rice

TOPO WHISKEY & COKE BRAISED BEEF.Description: boneless beef short rib slow-braised in a whikey & Coke sauce with roasted vegetables & mashed potatoes.

NEW YORK STRIP STEAK*.Description: salt & pepper grilled hand-cut 12 oz. NY strip steak* topped with house made Worcestershire sauce, mashed potatoes & garlic sautee' spinach

MEXICALI BOWL.Description: brown rice, black beans, mixed cheddar cheeses, pico de gallo, avocado, pickled jalapeños, sour cream & crisp tortilla strips

QUINOA BOWL.Description: black, red & golden quinoa with baby greens, Old Well White vinaigrette, grape tomatoes, red onions, cucumber & house-made feta tzatziki

TERIYAKI CAULIFLOWER BOWL.Description: brown rice stir-fried with cauliflower, edamame, red & green cabbage, red & poblano peppers, scallions & sesame seeds in a sesame-soy sauce

CREME BRÛLÉE CHEESECAKE.Description: vanilla cheesecake with torched sugar crust, raspberry sauce & Chantilly cream

TAR HEEL BUNDT CAKE.Description: Rich triple chocolate mini bundt cake with vanilla ice cream & chocolate sauce

KEY LIME POT DE CREME.Description: Rich key lime custard with cinnamon graham crumble topped with raspberry sauce, Chantilly cream & candied lime

RED VELVET ICE CREAM CAKE.Description: Red velvet cake with cream cheese ice cream topped with topped with chocolate sauce and whipped cream

Cheesy Tots.Description: Our famous Sup tots covered in shredded cheese and melted all over.

Jalapeno Popper Tots.Description: A pile of Sup tots topped with shredded cheese, fresh diced jalapeños and drizzled with hot sauce and ranch.

Macho Nachos.Description: Fresh warm chips smothered in homemade chili and melted cheeses, topped with lettuce, fresh cut jalapeños and sour cream.

Buffalo Boneless Wings.Description: 1/2 pound of smothered deliciousness, choose from Buffalo, honey BBQ or smoky BBQ style.

Pepperoni Pizza Fries.Description: Our thick, long-cut fries topped with melted Mozzarella cheese, bold pizza sauce and flavorful pepperoni slices. Served with homemade ranch for dipping.

Taco Tots.Description: Our Sup tots topped with chili, mixed cheeses, lettuce, tomatoes and drizzled with hot sauce.

Green Bean Fries.Description: A pile of lightly battered green beans, flash-fried and served with homemade ranch for dipping.

Fried Pickle Fries.Description: Crispy, tangy thin-cut dill pickle fries. Served with homemade ranch for dipping.

Funnel Cake Stix.Description: One bite will take you back to the North Carolina state fair. Sprinkled with powdered sugar and perfect for sharing.

Sup Dog Combo.Description: Our pride and joy. A homemade 16 ingredient chili simmered for over 6 hours, sitting on top of an all-beef hot dog and topped with our special Sup Dog sauce. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Old School Dog Combo.Description: Done in the memory of the old school chili dog. An all-beef hot dog topped with fresh cut onions, homemade chili and mustard. Be young again! All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Simple Dog Combo.Description: A plain all-beef dog, sitting on a warm, steamy bun. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Slaw Dog Combo.Description: Our homemade chili and delicious slaw come together to meet between the buns. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Spicy Dog Combo.Description: This is a BIG, thiccc, spicy, all-beef hot dog. Tell us how you want it! *Double The Dog $2 All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Chili Cheese Dog Combo.Description: Shredded Monterey Jack and Cheddar cheeses, slightly melted underneath our homemade chili. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Smokehouse Dog Combo.Description: Bacon, Monterey Jack and Cheddar cheese, chili, Sup Dog sauce. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping

Hawaiian Dog Combo.Description: Sweet pineapple, honey mustard, Sup Dog sauce. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Sweet Dog Combo.Description: Bacon, fresh cut lettuce, honey mustard, Sup Dog sauce. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Firehouse Dog Combo.Description: Chili, fresh cut jalapeños, Monterey Jack and Cheddar cheeses, hot sauce. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Cool Down Dog Combo.Description: Monterey Jack and Cheddar cheeses, chili, lettuce, cool sour cream. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Cheesy Bacon Delight Combo.Description: Lots of melty cheese, bacon, Sup Dog sauce. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Smokehouse Burger Combo.Description: A burger that can't get any more juicy and smoky, over 1/3 lb patty topped with thick sliced bacon, grilled onions, cheese and Sup Dog sauce. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Sup Burger Combo with Cheese.Description: Some people say restaurant style burgers, but we say Sup Dog style burgers! A 1/3 lb. hand-packed fresh burger, topped with American cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, fresh cut pickles and of course, Sup Dog sauce. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Buffalo Chicken Sandwich Combo.Description: Our lightly battered chicken, dipped in our homemade Buffalo sauce and topped with melted American cheese, homemade ranch, onions, lettuce and tomato. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Hot Honey BBQ Chicken Sandwich Combo.Description: Our mouth-watering chicken, lightly battered and tossed in our homemade honey BBQ sauce. Topped with lettuce, cheese, ranch and sliced hickory bacon. All combos include a pile of long-cut fries and famous Sup Dog sauce for dipping.

Bacon, Egg & Cheese Biscuit.Description: The McDonald's Bacon, Egg & Cheese Biscuit breakfast sandwich features a warm, buttermilk biscuit brushed with real butter, thick cut Applewood smoked bacon, a fluffy folded egg, and a slice of melty American cheese.

Egg McMuffin.Description: McDonald's Egg McMuffin® recipe features a freshly cracked Grade A egg placed on a toasted English Muffin topped with real butter, lean Canadian bacon, and melty American cheese.

Sausage McMuffin.Description: McDonald's Sausage McMuffin® recipe features a warm, freshly toasted English muffin, topped with a savory hot sausage patty and a slice of melty American cheese.

Sausage McMuffin® with Egg.Description: McDonald’s Sausage McMuffin® with Egg features a savory hot sausage, a slice of melty American cheese, and a delicious freshly cracked egg all on a freshly toasted English muffin.

Sausage Biscuit.Description: McDonald’s Sausage Biscuit is the perfect sausage breakfast sandwich to start your day! Our Sausage Biscuit recipe is made with sizzling hot sausage on a warm buttermilk biscuit that’s topped with real butter and baked to perfection.

Sausage Biscuit with Egg.Description: McDonald's Sausage and Egg Biscuit sandwich features a warm, flaky biscuit brushed with real butter, a sizzling hot pork sausage patty, and a classic McDonald's folded egg. It's the perfect savory biscuit breakfast sandwich when you're looking for a quick, easy breakfast.

Bacon, Egg & Cheese McGriddles.Description: Bacon, Egg & Cheese McGriddles® feature soft, warm griddle cakes with the sweet taste of maple. McDonald's McGriddles® recipe features thick-cut Applewood smoked bacon, a fluffy folded egg, and a slice of melty American cheese. McGriddles® cakes have no artificial preservatives or flavors and no colors from artificial sources.

Sausage McGriddles.Description: Our Sausage McGriddles® breakfast sandwich features soft, warm griddle cakes—with the taste of sweet maple—that hold our savory, sizzling hot sausage. McGriddles® cakes have no artificial preservatives or flavors and no colors from artificial sources.

Sausage, Egg & Cheese McGriddles.Description: Sausage, Egg & Cheese McGriddles® feature soft, warm griddle cakes—with the sweet taste of maple—that hold a fluffy folded egg, savory sausage, and melty American cheese. McGriddles® cakes have no artificial preservatives or flavors and no colors from artificial sources.

Hotcakes and Sausage.Description: Featuring 3 golden brown hotcakes and real butter, topped with sweet maple flavored hotcake syrup. On the side, you get a hot McDonald's sausage patty.

Hotcakes.Description: This McDonald's breakfast comes with 3 golden brown hotcakes. There are 580 calories in McDonald's hotcakes.

Sausage Burrito.Description: McDonald's Breakfast Burrito recipe is loaded with fluffy scrambled egg, pork sausage, melty cheese, green chiles, and onion!

Big Mac.Description: two 100% pure all beef patties and Big Mac® sauce sandwiched between a sesame seed bun. It’s topped off with pickles, crisp shredded lettuce, finely chopped onion, and a slice of American cheese. It contains no artificial flavors, preservatives, or added colors from artificial sources. Our pickle contains an artificial preservative, so skip it if you like.

Quarter Pounder®* with Cheese.Description: Each Quarter Pounder® with Cheese burger features a ¼ lb.* of 100% fresh beef that’s hot, deliciously juicy and cooked when you order. It’s seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper, sizzled on a flat iron grill, then topped with slivered onions, tangy pickles and two slices of melty American cheese on a sesame seed bun. Our QPC® contains no artificial flavors, preservatives or added colors from artificial sources.

Double Quarter Pounder®* with Cheese.Description: Each Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese features two quarter pound* 100% fresh beef burger patties that are hot, deliciously juicy and cooked when you order. McDonald’s beef patties are seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper, sizzled on a flat iron grill, then topped with slivered onions, tangy pickles and two slices of melty cheese on a sesame seed bun. It contains no artificial flavors, preservatives or added colors from artificial sources.

Quarter Pounder®* with Cheese Deluxe.Description: McDonald's Quarter Pounder® with Cheese Deluxe is a fresh take on a Quarter Pounder® classic burger. Crisp shredded lettuce and three Roma tomato slices top a ¼ lb.* of 100% McDonald’s fresh beef that’s hot, deliciously juicy and cooked when you order. Seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper and sizzled on our flat iron grill. Layered with two slices of melty American cheese, creamy mayo, slivered onions and tangy pickles on a soft, fluffy sesame seed hamburger bun.

Cheeseburger.Description: Our simple, classic cheeseburger begins with a 100% pure beef burger patty seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper. The McDonald’s Cheeseburger is topped with a tangy pickle, chopped onions, ketchup, mustard, and a slice of melty American cheese. It contains no artificial flavors, preservatives or added colors from artificial sources.

GOAT CHEESE SALAD.Description: fresh greens tossed in house-made raspberry vinaigrette, garnished with pecans, golden raisins & local goat cheese (vegetarian)

Chick-fil-A Chicken Sandwich.Description: A boneless breast of chicken seasoned to perfection, freshly breaded, pressure cooked in 100% refined peanut oil and served on a toasted, buttered bun with dill pickle chips. Also available on a multigrain bun.

Chick-fil-A Deluxe Sandwich.Description: A boneless breast of chicken seasoned to perfection, freshly breaded, pressure cooked in 100% refined peanut oil and served on a toasted, buttered bun with dill pickle chips, green leaf lettuce, tomato and American cheese. Also available on a multigrain bun.

Spicy Chicken Sandwich.Description: A boneless breast of chicken seasoned with a spicy blend of peppers, freshly breaded, pressure cooked in 100% refined peanut oil and served on a toasted, buttered bun with dill pickle chips. Also available on a multigrain bun.

Spicy Deluxe Sandwich.Description: A boneless breast of chicken seasoned with a spicy blend of peppers, freshly breaded, pressure cooked in 100% refined peanut oil and served on a toasted, buttered bun with dill pickle chips, green leaf lettuce, tomato and Pepper Jack Cheese. Also available on a multigrain bun.

Grilled Chicken Sandwich.Description: A lemon-herb marinated boneless breast of chicken, grilled for a tender and juicy backyard-smoky taste, served on a toasted multigrain bun with green leaf lettuce and tomato. The grilled chicken sandwich pairs well with Honey Roasted BBQ sauce.

Chick-fil-A Grilled Chicken Club Sandwic.Description: A lemon-herb marinated boneless breast of chicken, grilled for a tender and juicy backyard-smokey taste, served on a toasted multigrain brioche bun with Colby Jack cheese, applewood smoked bacon, green leaf lettuce and tomato. Pairs well with Honey Roasted BBQ Sauce.

Chick-fil-A Nuggets.Description: Bite-sized pieces of boneless chicken breast, seasoned to perfection, freshly breaded and pressure cooked in 100% refined peanut oil. Available with choice of dipping sauce.

Grilled Nuggets.Description: Bite-sized pieces of freshly marinated boneless breast of chicken, grilled for a tender and juicy backyard-smoky taste. Available with guest's choice of dipping sauce.

Chick-fil-A Chick-n-Strips.Description: Made from the most tender part of the chicken breast, our Chick-n-Strips™ are marinated in special seasonings, freshly breaded and pressure cooked to perfection in 100% refined peanut oil.

Chick-fil-A Cool Wrap.Description: Sliced grilled chicken breast nestled in a fresh mix of green leaf lettuce with a blend of shredded Monterey Jack and Cheddar cheeses, tightly rolled in a flaxseed flour flat bread. Made fresh daily. Pairs well with Avocado Lime Ranch dressing.

Gluten Free Bun.Description: A certified gluten-free bun, individually packaged to be an alternative for our guests wishing to minimize gluten in their diets. Our recipe, enriched with vitamins and minerals, features a blend of amaranth and quinoa, all lightly sweetened with molasses and raisins.

Filets.Description: A boneless breast of chicken seasoned to perfection, hand-breaded, pressure cooked in 100% refined peanut oil.

Grilled Market Salad w/ Grilled Filet.Description: Sliced grilled chicken breast served on a fresh bed of mixed greens, topped with crumbled blue cheese and a mix of red and green apples, strawberries and blueberries. Prepared fresh daily. Served with Harvest Nut Granola and Roasted Almonds. Pairs well with Zesty Apple Cider Vinaigrette.

Spicy Southwest Salad.Description: Slices of grilled spicy chicken breast (cold) served on a fresh bed of mixed greens, topped with grape tomatoes, a blend of Monterey Jack and Cheddar cheeses, and a zesty combination of roasted corn, black beans, poblano chiles, and red bell peppers. Made fresh daily. Served with Seasoned Tortilla Strips and Chili Lime Pepitas. Pairs well with Creamy Salsa dressing.

Cobb Salad w/ Nuggets.Description: Chick-fil-A® Nuggets, freshly breaded and pressure-cooked, sliced and served hot on a fresh bed of mixed greens, topped with roasted corn kernels, a blend of shredded Monterey Jack and Cheddar cheeses, crumbled bacon, sliced hard-boiled egg and grape tomatoes. Prepared fresh daily. Served with Charred Tomato and Crispy Red Bell Peppers. Pairs well with Avocado Lime Ranch dressing.

Chick-fil-A Waffle Potato Fries.Description: Waffle-cut potatoes cooked in canola oil until crispy outside and tender inside. Sprinkled with Sea Salt.

Fruit Cup.Description: A nutritious fruit mix made with chopped pieces of red and green apples, mandarin orange segments, fresh strawberry slices, and blueberries, served chilled. Prepared fresh daily.

Side Salad.Description: A fresh bed of mixed greens, topped with a blend of shredded Monterey Jack and Cheddar cheeses and grape tomatoes. Prepared fresh daily. Served with charred tomato, crispy red bell peppers and choice of dressing.

Mac & Cheese.Description: A classic macaroni and cheese recipe featuring a special blend of cheeses including Parmesan, Cheddar, and Romano. Baked in-restaurant to form a crispy top layer of baked cheese.

Chicken Noodle Soup.Description: Shredded Chick-fil-A® chicken breast, chopped carrots and celery with egg noodles in a hearty broth. Served with Saltine crackers.

Kale Crunch Side.Description: A blend of Curly Kale and Green Cabbage tossed with an Apple Cider and Dijon Mustard vinaigrette, all topped off with salted, crunchy Roasted Almonds

Greek Yogurt Parfait w/ Granola.Description: Creamy, organic vanilla bean Greek yogurt with fresh berries and choice of toppings.

Waffle Potato Chips.Description: Kettle-cooked waffle cut potato chips Sprinkled with Sea Salt.

Buddy Fruits Apple Sauce.Description: Buddy Fruits® brand applesauce is a 100% all natural combination of fresh apples, apple juice and cinnamon, blended smooth and served in a fun, squeezable 3.2 oz. child-size pouch.

Frosted Lemonade.Description: This refreshing treat is a hand-spun combination of Chick-fil-A® Lemonade (or Diet Lemonade) and our signature Icedream® dessert.

Frosted Coffee.Description: A hand-spun treat that combines a custom blend of cold-brewed coffee with our signature Icedream® dessert.

Chocolate Chunk Cookie.Description: Baked each day in our Restaurants, these cookies have both semi-sweet dark and milk chocolate chunks, along with wholesome oats for an old-fashioned touch.
